languages.text: {n}Лицо хормейстера искажает маска ужаса, быстро превратившаяся в гримасу искренней злобы.{/n} "Это ошибка, {name}. Вы не понимаете на что вы обрекаете нас! Этот корабль! Династию!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо хормейстера искажает маска ужаса, быстро превратившаяся в гримасу искренней злобы.{/n} "Это ошибка, {name}. Вы не понимаете на что вы обрекаете нас! Этот корабль! Династию!"

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо хормейстера искажает маска ужаса, быстро превратившаяся в гримасу искренней злобы.{/n} "Это ошибка, {name}. Вы не понимаете на что вы обрекаете нас! Этот корабль! Династию!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "That is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

{n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "That is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

{n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "That is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

{n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "That is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

{n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

{n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

languages.text: {n}El rostro del maestro del Coro se vuelve una máscara horrorizada, y pronto pasa a ser una expresión de pura ira.{/n} «Está cometiendo un error, {name}. ¡No tiene ni idea de a qué nos está condenando! ¡A nosotros, a esta nave y a su dinastía!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del maestro del Coro se vuelve una máscara horrorizada, y pronto pasa a ser una expresión de pura ira.{/n} «Está cometiendo un error, {name}. ¡No tiene ni idea de a qué nos está condenando! ¡A nosotros, a esta nave y a su dinastía!».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターの顔に恐怖が広がり、すぐに心底怒っているように表情を歪めた。{/n}「それは間違いだ、{name}。私たちに何をさせようとしているのか分かっていない！この船が…そしてあなたの王朝が破滅に向かう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターの顔に恐怖が広がり、すぐに心底怒っているように表情を歪めた。{/n}「それは間違いだ、{name}。私たちに何をさせようとしているのか分かっていない！この船が…そしてあなたの王朝が破滅に向かう！」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师的脸扭曲在一起，充满了恐惧，但随后便变得怒不可遏。{/n}“这实在是大错特错，{name}。您根本不清楚这么做会给我们带来什么后果！这艘船要完蛋了！您的王朝也要完蛋了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师的脸扭曲在一起，充满了恐惧，但随后便变得怒不可遏。{/n}“这实在是大错特错，{name}。您根本不清楚这么做会给我们带来什么后果！这艘船要完蛋了！您的王朝也要完蛋了！”

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Chormeisters ist zu einer Maske des Entsetzens verzerrt, die sich schnell in eine Grimasse der zügellosen Wut verwandelt.{/n} "Das ist ein Fehler, {name}. Ihr habt keinen blassen Schimmer, wozu Ihr uns verdammt! Dieses Schiff verdammt! Und Eure Dynastie!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Chormeisters ist zu einer Maske des Entsetzens verzerrt, die sich schnell in eine Grimasse der zügellosen Wut verwandelt.{/n} "Das ist ein Fehler, {name}. Ihr habt keinen blassen Schimmer, wozu Ihr uns verdammt! Dieses Schiff verdammt! Und Eure Dynastie!"

languages.text: {n}Un masque d'horreur pure s'abat sur le visage du maître de chœur avant de céder la place à une grimace de fureur viscérale.{/n} « Vous commettez une grave erreur, {name}. Vous n'imaginez pas les dangers auxquels vous nous exposez ! Ce faisant, vous condamnez l'ensemble de votre vaisseau et de votre dynastie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un masque d'horreur pure s'abat sur le visage du maître de chœur avant de céder la place à une grimace de fureur viscérale.{/n} « Vous commettez une grave erreur, {name}. Vous n'imaginez pas les dangers auxquels vous nous exposez ! Ce faisant, vous condamnez l'ensemble de votre vaisseau et de votre dynastie ! »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi'nin yüzüne bir dehşet örtüsü hâkim oluyor. Ardından hızlıca yüzünü ekşiterek tüm samimiyetiyle öfkesini sergiliyor.{/n} "Hata yapıyorsunuz {name}. Bizi, tüm gemiyi ve hanedanlığınızı ne tür bir felakete mahkûm ettiğinizin farkında değilsiniz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face is twisted into a mask of horror, which quickly turns into a grimace of wholehearted anger.{/n} "This is a mistake, {name}. You have no idea what you are dooming us to! Dooming this ship! And your dynasty!"
